techmeme.title: Apple releases macOS 15.0.1, which "improves compatibility with third-party security software", after the Sequoia's release broke some third-party tools (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
A deep dive on Chris Lehane, super PACs like Fairshake, and recent political savagery from some Silicon Valley execs, effectively targeting Katie Porter, others (Charles Duhigg/New Yorker)
Filing: KoBold Metals, which uses ML to help it sift through datasets to identify large deposits of various metals, has raised $491M of a targeted $527M round (Tim De Chant/TechCrunch)
How Malaysia's Johor went from a backwater to having one of the world's biggest AI data center construction projects, with an estimated ~$3.8B invested in 2024 (Stu Woo/Wall Street Journal)
SCOTUS rejects X's appeal over Special Counsel Jack Smith's secret DOJ search warrant for records related to Donald Trump's account and upholds a $350K fine (Greg Stohr/Bloomberg)
